title: IMF Says Thai Fiscal Support, Rate Cut Needed For Tepid Economy
description: Thailand needs a “carefully calibrated” mix of policies to support a slowing economy, the International Monetary Fund said, urging targeted fiscal support with additional monetary easing.
content: Thailand needs a “carefully calibrated” mix of policies to support a slowing economy, the International Monetary Fund said, urging targeted fiscal support with additional monetary easing.
